text: Well, they haven't seen my portfolio. I'll probably take my artbook from school and other personal things but I do need to add some new artwork:smiley:

Cool. I am happy to help select pieces for your portfolio, and consider anything new we could add. I review the portfolios of the applicants for our university in games, vfx and animation all the time so I have a good sense of what is helpful to show a teacher :wink: Let me know if you want suggestions.

Cool. So best to start with 1) collecting the art pieces you want to out into your portfolio, since I am not familiar with all of your work. For now, include pieces that you are not sure  as well and we can always edit them down to the most appropriate, or best pieces. Eventually we will design a portfolio specifically catering to BRITS :wink:

2) if they gave any info or description of what they want to see in the portfolio, then send me that and I will get a good idea of what they are linking for.
